turns.speaker: user

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Hmm, something quick and easy. Maybe burgers? And I'm really not in the mood for Mexican tonight. Had it last night.

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Okay, for burgers, I recommend 'Burger Bliss' and 'The Patty Palace'. Burger Bliss has excellent reviews and is just a few blocks away. The Patty Palace is a bit further but often has less of a wait. Their websites are: [website links]. I am also showing you the locations of these restaurants on the map.

turns.speaker: user
